section.title: Our experience with default CSS behavior
section.p: In the Ant scripts used to build the DITA Open Toolkit User Guide and Reference, we used only the default CSS stylesheet so that you can see what output that produces. However, using the default does not always produce the best results. For example, one problem we would like to address is that the default CSS for XHTML does not have any <filepath> class defined, so all <filepath> elements are unstyled.
